purpose: The email is a call for participation in the 29th Ada-Europe International Conference on Reliable Software Technologies (AEiC 2025), scheduled for June 10-13, 2025, in Paris, France. It highlights the early registration deadline of May 27, 2025, and encourages attendees to register for tutorials and workshops. The conference will feature a packed program including keynote talks, technical presentations, and social events, providing a platform for networking among academics and industry practitioners. The email also outlines the conference's history, venue, and various activities planned for the week, emphasizing the importance of the Ada programming language in reliable software technologies.

evidence_sentences: 29th Ada-Europe International Conference on Reliable Software Technologies (AEiC 2025)
Register now: discounted fees until May 27!
The conference schedule comprises keynote and invited talks, a journal track, an industrial track, a work-in-progress track, a vendor exhibition, parallel tutorials, and satellite workshops.
AEiC 2025 is the latest in a series of annual international conferences started in the early 80's, under the auspices of Ada-Europe.
The conference provides several opportunities to socialize.

Extensive information on AEiC 2025 will be on the conference website, such as an overview of the program, the list of accepted papers and presentations, and descriptions of workshops, tutorials, keynote and invited presentations, and social events.
